ygData.subject: RE: Revenant-helps-hints pls
ygData.msgSnippet: There are 5 sections in the cave, which you have to complete them one after the other.  At the last section, you need to trigger 5 switch to open the 5 metal
ygData.messageBody:
There are 5 sections in the cave, which you have to complete them one after
the other. At the last section, you need to trigger 5 switch to open the 5
metal gate to reach the boss mob. The boss mob has 5000HP, u must make use
of the ice arrows to stun it, then keep casting on it (ie u need tons of
mana potions) as hacking does not seem to hurt it much.

It's hard to explain how to get out of the caves, since I spend 3 night
there whacking, kinda big dungeon. I got the walkthru (only until the cave
stage) to help me to find my way. I dun have the URL in my office PC. U
can try your luck searching the net.

Good luck. ;)

wrote:
